list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a piece of evidence or information used in the detection of a crime or solving of a mystery.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: police officers are still searching for clues
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cảnh sát vẫn đang tìm kiếm manh mối

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a verbal formula giving an indication as to what is to be inserted in a particular space in a crossword or other puzzle.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a long-pondered clue in a half-completed crossword
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một manh mối nghiêm túc trong một ô chữ hoàn thành một nửa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: inform someone about a particular matter.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Stella had clued her in about Peter
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Stella đã làm cô ấy nói về Peter
